TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SiteMapPath extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl

summary.span: 显示一组文本或图像的超链接，使用户能够更轻松地浏览网站，同时占用最少量的页面空间。

span.span: Displays a set of text or image hyperlinks that enable users to more easily navigate a Web site, while taking a minimal amount of page space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [节点Nodes](#nodes) - [节点外观Node Appearance](#node_appearance) - [事件Events](#events) - [说明如何自定义Customizing the SiteMapPath Control](#customizing_the_sitemappath_control) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件是一个反映提供的数据的站点导航控件对象。The control is a site navigation control that reflects data provided by the object. 它使您能够轻松地导航站点节省空间，并充当其中在当前显示的页面是在站点内的参考点。It provides a space-saving way to easily navigate a site and serves as a point of reference for where the currently displayed page is within a site. 此类型的控件通常称为痕迹导航或眉毛导航，因为它将显示提供从当前位置层次结构中的页转义层次结构路径的超链接的页名称。This type of control is commonly called a breadcrumb, or eyebrow, because it displays a hierarchical path of hyperlinked page names that provides an escape up the hierarchy of pages from the current location. 。. 可用于站点，但又具有深层分层页结构或可能需要过多页上的空间。The is useful for sites that have deep hierarchical page structures, but where a or might require too much space on a page. 控件的工作方式直接与你的 Web 站点站点地图数据。The control works directly with your Web site's site map data. 如果你使用它在页上不会显示在你的站点代码图中，将不会显示。If you use it on a page that is not represented in your site map, it will not be displayed. 有关站点映射的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 站点导航](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23de8a05-cac3-4693-b508-39f1d4b7053d)。For more information about site maps, see [ASP.NET Site Navigation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23de8a05-cac3-4693-b508-39f1d4b7053d). ## 节点Nodes 节点组成。The is made up of nodes. 在路径中的每个元素都称为一个节点，它由对象。Each element in the path is called a node and is represented by a object. 锚定路径并表示的层次结构树的节点称为根节点。The node that anchors the path and represents the base of the hierarchical tree is called the root node. 表示当前显示的页的节点是当前节点。The node that represents the currently displayed page is the current node. 当前节点与根节点之间的任何其他节点是一个父节点。Any other node between the current node and root node is a parent node. 下表介绍的三个不同的节点类型。The following table describes the three different node types. |节点类型Node type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |根root|一个定位一组分层的节点的节点。A node that anchors a hierarchical set of nodes.| |父parent|具有一个或多个子节点，但不是当前节点的节点。A node that has one or more child nodes, but is not the current node.| |当前current|一个表示当前显示的页的节点。A node that represents the currently displayed page.| ## 节点外观Node Appearance 显示每个节点是或控件，可以应用模板或到样式。Each node displayed by a is a or control that you can apply a template or style to. 模板和样式将应用到节点根据两个规则的优先顺序：The templates and styles are applied to nodes according to two rules of precedence: - 如果节点为定义了模板，它将覆盖任何节点定义的样式。If a template is defined for a node, it overrides any style defined for the node. - 模板和特定于类型的节点的样式重写的常规模板和样式定义的所有节点。Templates and styles that are specific to types of nodes override general templates and styles defined for all nodes. 和属性应用到所有的节点，而不考虑其节点类型。The and properties are applied to all nodes, regardless of their node type. 如果定义了这两个这些属性，优先。If both these properties are defined, the takes precedence. 和属性应用于表示当前显示的页的节点。The and properties are applied to nodes that represent the currently displayed page. 如果除了定义，它将被忽略。If a is defined in addition to the , it is ignored. 如果除了定义，它会与合并若要创建合并的样式。If a is defined in addition to the , it is merged with the to create a merged style. 此合并的样式使用的所有元素，加上的任何其他元素，不会与冲突。This merged style uses all the elements of the , plus any additional elements of the that do not conflict with the . 和属性应用于表示站点导航层次结构的根节点。The and properties are applied to the node that represents the root of the site navigation hierarchy. 如果除了定义，它将被忽略。If a is defined in addition to the , it is ignored. 如果除了定义，它会与合并若要创建合并的样式。If a is defined in addition to the , it is merged with the to create a merged style. 此合并的样式使用的所有元素，加上的任何其他元素未不与冲突。This merged style uses all the elements of the , plus any additional elements of the that did not conflict with the . 最后，如果在当前显示的页面为该站点的根页和而不是使用或。Finally, if the currently displayed page is the root page of the site, the and are used instead of the or . 控件使用由标识站点地图提供商提供作为站点导航信息其数据源的属性。The control uses the site map provider identified by the property as its data source for site navigation information. 如果不指定任何提供程序，则它使用默认的提供程序为使站点，在中标识属性。If no provider is specified, it uses the default provider for the site, identified in the property. 通常，这是对 ASP.NET、 默认站点地图提供商提供的实例。Typically, this is an instance of the default site map provider for ASP.NET, the . 如果控件用于在站点内，但没有站点映射的提供程序配置，该控件将引发异常。If the control is used within a site but no site map provider is configured, the control throws an exception. ## 事件Events 控件还提供了可以编程的事件。The control also provides events that you can program against. 这允许你每次事件发生时运行的自定义的例程。This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出了支持控件。The following table lists the events supported by the control. |事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||发生时控件首先创建并将其与关联。Occurs when the control first creates a and associates it with a .| ||发生时绑定到站点地图数据包含的。Occurs when a is bound to site map data contained by the .| ## 说明如何自定义Customizing the SiteMapPath Control 派生自的类重写方法以自定义包含导航控件的控件。Classes that derive from override the method to customize the controls contained by the navigation control. 为了完全控制方式对象会创建并添加到派生类会重写方法。For complete control over the way objects are created and added to the , derived classes override the method. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用以声明方式在 Web 窗体页中的控件。The following code example uses a control declaratively in a Web Forms page. 此示例演示一些用于管理与模板和样式应用到的顺序的规则优先顺序节点。This example demonstrates some of the rules of precedence that govern the order with which templates and styles are applied to nodes. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5/CS/webform2navpathcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5/VB/webform2navpathvb.aspx#1)] 前面的示例使用具有以下结构的默认站点地图提供商提供和 Web.sitemap 文件。The previous example uses the default site map provider and a Web.sitemap file with the following structure. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展控制并向其中添加新功能，通过重写方法。The following code example demonstrates extends the control and adds new functionality to it by overriding the method. `DropDownSiteMapPath`控件将添加后当前节点，以便轻松导航至的当前页的子节点的页面。The `DropDownSiteMapPath` control adds a after the current node, to enable easy navigation to pages that are child nodes of the current page. 此示例演示如何使用对象，包括检查其并调用方法后创建的项。This example demonstrates how to work with objects, including checking their and calling the method after the items are created. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1/CS/dropdownnavigationpath.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1/VB/dropdownnavigationpath.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 动态地添加控制到页上，创建一个新对象、 设置其属性，并将其添加到如容器控件的集合。To dynamically add a control to a page, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the collection of a container control such as . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数来添加到页上的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to add a control to a page. 对于该示例能工作，你需要将映像添加到根目录，并将更改为图像文件的名称从"myimage.jpg"的示例代码中的映像名称。For the example to work, you need to add an image to your root directory and change the image name in the example code from "myimage.jpg" to the name of your image file. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_3/CS/aboutus2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_3/VB/aboutus2vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Examines the site map structure provided by the and builds a child controls collection based on the styles and templates defined for the functional nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建控制，将它们与相应关联对象从当前站点映射提供程序，并添加到的节点集合。The method creates controls, associates them with the corresponding objects from the current site map provider, and adds the nodes to the collection. 该方法首先查找，然后向上层次结构树的遍历对象，创建之前每个为止。The method begins by finding the , and then walks up the hierarchical tree of objects, creating a for each one until the is reached. 在每行后创建，但之前绑定到其对应、调用方法。After each is created, but before it is bound to its corresponding , the method is called. 方法适用的任何模板或定义特定节点类型的样式和创建并初始化任何子控件，包含。The method applies any templates or styles defined for a particular node type and creates and initializes any child controls that the contains. 最后，方法将添加的子控件到集合。Finally, the method adds the child controls of the to the collection. 在每行后初始化时，调用方法。After each is initialized, the method is called. 则绑定到其对应，和调用。Then the is bound to its corresponding , and is called. 方法调用从方法。The method is called from the method. 扩展的类控制替代方法，以便更改如何创建或添加到控件控件。Classes that extend the control override the method to alter how the controls are created or added to the control. 在中执行的操作的各个节点项方法，并扩展的大多数类重写该方法仅。The manipulation of individual node items is performed in the method, and most classes that extend override that method only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制表示在当前显示的页面的导航路径节点的显示文本的外观。Use the property to control the appearance of the display text for the navigation path node that represents the currently displayed page. 默认情况下，显示文本是在中指定属性表示页。By default, the display text is that specified in the property of the that represents the page. 常见样式设置包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色、 字体属性和节点间距。Common style settings include custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 有关节点，样式属性合并到单个样式，按以下顺序：For nodes, style properties are merged into a single style, in the following order: 1. 2. 或者，如果当前显示的页是根节点中， 。 or, if the currently displayed page is the root node, . > [!NOTE] > 除非显式设置为，如果节点字体样式设置为带删除线或上划线样式时，不显示节点的默认下划线样式`true`。If you set the node font style to a strikeout or overline style, the default underline style of the node is not displayed unless it is explicitly set to `true`. 如果定义属性，则忽略属性。If a property is defined, the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式设置的Web 窗体页中的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the of a control in a Web Forms page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置到对象，用于控件或其他控件，如，用作当前节点的用户界面元素而不是字符串。Set the to an object to use an control or some other control, such as a , as the current node's user interface element instead of a string. 如果属性设置，则将重写模板，显示的当前导航节点文本和任何应用于它。If the property is set, the template overrides both the current navigation node text displayed and any applied to it. 如果当前显示的页，对应于根节点中，但是，或使用。If the currently displayed page corresponds to the root node, however, the or is used. 你可以以声明方式设置属性设置为任何 Web 服务器控件中，和 ASP.NET 基础结构执行必要的步骤来包装为该 Web 服务器控件对象。You can declaratively set the property to any Web server control, and the ASP.NET infrastructure performs the necessary steps to wrap the Web server control as an object. 但是，Web 服务器控件不实现接口; 因此，当你处理的属性以编程方式，你必须编写包装器的任何模板代码。However, Web server controls do not implement the interface; therefore, when you work with the properties programmatically, you must write an wrapper for any template code. 然后，属性设置为实例包装器。Then, the property is set to an instance of the wrapper. ## Examples 下面的代码示例以声明方式定义和替代定义。The following code example declaratively defines a and overrides a defined . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5/CS/webform2navpathcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5/VB/webform2navpathvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定该项表示通过检查的节点的功能类型，并应用任何模板或为该类型的节点定义的样式。The method determines the functional type of node that the item represents by checking the , and applies any templates or styles that are defined for that kind of node. 如果具有项目类型，创建子控件，与和可能应用。If the has a item type, a child control is created, and the and may be applied. 如果设置，其应用于该节点。If the is set, its is applied to the node. 中改为设置，它会与任何定义合并和应用。In instead the is set, it is merged with any defined and applied. 最后，如果未定义任何模板或样式，基本控件创建并初始化与该节点的值。Finally, if no templates or styles are defined, a basic control is created and initialized with values from the node. 如果具有项目类型，或者或创建子控件，具体取决于的返回值。If the has a item type, either a or child control is created, depending on the return value of . 然后任一或可能应用。Then either the or may be applied. 如果设置，其应用于该节点。If the is set, its is applied to the node. 如果改为设置，它会与任何定义合并和应用。If instead the is set, it is merged with any defined and applied. 如果具有项目类型，创建子控件和和可能应用。If the has a item type, a child control is created and the and may be applied. 如果设置，其应用于该节点。If the is set, its is applied to the node. 如果改为，则应用该策略。If instead the is set, it is applied. 最后，如果具有项目类型，创建子控件和和为定义的相同常规规则将根据应用节点类型。Finally, if the has a item type, a child control is created and the and are applied according to the same general rules defined for a node type. 重写方法以操作各个对象。Override the method to manipulate individual objects. 如果类的设计需要更多扩展性控制如何对象会创建并添加到控制，请重写方法。If the design of the class requires more extensive control over how the objects are created and added to the control, override the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法将功能添加到派生自的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to add functionality to a control that derives from . 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取用于站点导航路径中所有节点的显示文本的样式。

span.span: Gets the style used for the display text for all nodes in the site navigation path.

value.span: ，它包含 控件中显示文本的样式设置。

span.span: The that contains the style settings for the display text in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制由控件呈现的所有导航路径节点的显示文本的外观。Use the property to control the appearance of the display text for all navigation path nodes rendered by the control. 默认情况下，显示文本是在中指定属性表示页。By default, the display text is that specified in the property of the that represents the page. 常见样式设置包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色、 字体属性和节点间距。Common style settings include custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 有关节点，样式属性合并到单个样式，按以下顺序：For nodes, style properties are merged into a single style, in the following order: 1. 2. 或，具体取决于节点类型。 or , depending on the node type. > [!NOTE] > 除非显式设置为，如果节点字体样式设置为带删除线或上划线样式时，不显示节点的默认下划线样式`true`。If you set the node font style to a strikeout or overline style, the default underline style of the node is not displayed unless it is explicitly set to `true`. 如果是定义，它最初应用于每个节点。If the is defined, it is initially applied to each node. 如果其他样式定义为特定类型的节点，如根节点或当前节点，该样式所取代中指定的常规样式属性。If an additional style is defined for a particular type of node, such as the root node or current node, this style supersedes the general style specified in the property. 如果为特定类型的节点定义了模板，它所取代该节点的所有已定义的样式。If a template is defined for a particular type of node, it supersedes all defined styles for that node. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何定义与合并演示的样式优先顺序节点。The following code example demonstrates how to define a that is merged with a to demonstrate the order of style precedence for the nodes. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5/CS/webform2navpathcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5/VB/webform2navpathvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个控件模板，用于站点导航路径的所有功能节点。

span.span: Gets or sets a control template to use for all functional nodes of a site navigation path.

value.span: 一个 对象，它实现 方法，以呈现导航路径每个节点的自定义内容。

span.span: An object that implements the method, to render custom content for each node of a navigation path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置到对象，用于或其他控件，如，作为所有导航路径节点的用户界面元素。Set the to an object to use an or some other control, such as a , as a user interface element for all navigation path nodes. 如果属性设置，则将重写模板，显示的导航节点文本和任何应用于它。If the property is set, the template overrides both the navigation node text displayed and any applied to it. 当前和根节点，如果或设置，这些模板会重写。For the current and root nodes, if a or is set, these templates override the . 你可以以声明方式设置属性设置为任何 Web 服务器控件中，和 ASP.NET 基础结构执行必要的步骤来包装为该 Web 服务器控件对象。You can declaratively set the property to any Web server control, and the ASP.NET infrastructure performs the necessary steps to wrap the Web server control as an object. 但是，Web 服务器控件不实现接口; 因此，当你处理的属性以编程方式，你必须编写包装器的任何模板代码。However, Web server controls do not implement the interface; therefore, when you work with the properties programmatically, you must write an wrapper for any template code. 然后，属性设置为实例包装器。Then, the property is set to an instance of the wrapper. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何，当指定了一个重写为所有节点，包括根节点以及当前节点的特殊样式定义的样式。The following code example demonstrates how a , when one is specified, overrides styles defined for all nodes, including special styles for the root node and current node. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_6#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_6/CS/webform1navpathcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_6#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_6/VB/webform1navpathvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后引发事件控件创建，这是 Web 服务器控件表示，并将关联到。The event is raised after the control creates a , which is a Web server control that represents a , and associates it to a . 之前创建的节点项绑定到其数据调用方法。The method is called before the created node item is bound to its data. 这使您可以提供一个事件处理方法，就执行自定义例程每当创建。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever a is created. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法之后创建内方法。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method after creating a within the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1/CS/dropdownnavigationpath.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1/VB/dropdownnavigationpath.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件绑定到提供的数据及其。The event is raised when the control binds to the data provided by its . 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，例如更新数据库或显示的内容，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating a database or the displayed content, whenever this event occurs. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

summary.span: 获取或设置导航路径节点的呈现顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets the order that the navigation path nodes are rendered in.

value.span: 一个 ，指示呈现导航节点时的层次结构顺序。

span.span: A that indicates the hierarchical order that navigation nodes are rendered in.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示节点以从最顶部的节点到当前节点、从左到右的层次结构顺序呈现。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that the nodes are rendered in hierarchical order from the top-most node to the current node, from left to right.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置到如果你想要显示从左到右; 的导航路径的导航路径显示为前进从左到右的站点地图节点。Set to if you want to display the navigation path from left to right; the navigation path appears as a progression from left to right of site map nodes. 换而言之，在最左边的位置是根节点、 每个后续节点处于右侧下, 一步的位置和当前节点是最右侧的位置。In other words, the root node is at the leftmost position, each subsequent node is in the next position to the right, and the current node is in the rightmost position. 设置到如果你想要显示从右到左的导航路径。Set to if you want to display the navigation path from right to left. 换而言之，反转节点顺序，以便在最右边的位置显示的根节点和当前节点显示在左边的位置。In other words, the node order is reversed so that the root node displays at the rightmost position and the current node displays at the leftmost position. 虽然不是很常见，此排序可用于本地化 Web 窗体页面和从右到左阅读的语言的控件。While not as common, this ordering can be used for localizing Web Forms pages and the control for languages that read from right to left. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式设置属性Web 窗体页中。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property of a in a Web Forms page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制的导航路径的根节点的显示文本的外观。Use the property to control the appearance of the display text for the root node of the navigation path. 默认情况下，显示文本是在中指定属性表示页。By default, the display text is that specified in the property of the that represents the page. 常见样式设置包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色、 字体属性和节点间距。Common style settings include custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 有关节点，样式属性合并到单个样式，按以下顺序：For nodes, style properties are merged into a single style, in the following order: 1. 2. 或，具体取决于节点类型。 or , depending on the node type. > [!NOTE] > 除非显式设置为，如果节点字体样式设置为带删除线或上划线样式时，不显示节点的默认下划线样式`true`。If you set the node font style to a strikeout or overline style, the default underline style of the node is not displayed unless it is explicitly set to `true`. 如果定义属性，则忽略属性。If a property is defined, the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式设置属性上控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the attributes on a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_1/CS/customerservicecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_1/VB/customerservicevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个控件模板，用于站点导航路径的根节点。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置到对象，用于控件或其他控件，如作为根节点而不是字符串的用户界面元素。Set the to an object to use an control or some other control, such as a as the root node's user interface element instead of a string. 如果属性设置，则将重写模板，显示的根导航节点文本和任何应用于它。If the property is set, the template overrides both the root navigation node text displayed and any applied to it. 模板还将重写和如果根页是当前显示的页的属性。The template also overrides the and properties if the root page is the currently displayed page. 你可以以声明方式设置属性设置为任何 Web 服务器控件中，和 ASP.NET 基础结构执行必要的步骤来包装为该 Web 服务器控件。You can declaratively set the property to any Web server control, and the ASP.NET infrastructure performs the necessary steps to wrap the Web server control as an . 但是，Web 服务器控件不实现接口; 因此，当你处理的属性以编程方式，你必须编写包装器的任何模板代码。However, Web server controls do not implement the interface; therefore, when you work with the properties programmatically, you must write an wrapper for any template code. 然后，属性设置为实例包装器。Then, the property is set to an instance of the wrapper. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式定义一个类以实现接口以包装控件。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically define a class that implements the interface to wrap an control. 然后，属性设置为类的实例。Then, the property is set to an instance of the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_3/CS/aboutus2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_3/VB/aboutus2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态是服务器控件的属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值会自动放置在服务器控件的属性，它是实例的类。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 保存状态的服务器控件生命周期阶段后，此属性的值随后会保存到一个字符串对象。The value of this property is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 视图状态保存时，此字符串对象返回到客户端为存储在一个变量`Hidden`HTML 元素。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an `Hidden` HTML element. 在创作自定义服务器控件时，你可以通过重写此方法并修改你的服务器控件的提高效率属性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常见情况的情形是`Title`HTML 特性存在 HTML`A Href`超链接。The most common scenario is when a `Title` HTML attribute exists for an HTML `A Href` hyperlink. 例如，4.0 及更高版本的 Microsoft Internet Explorer 和 Netscape 6.0 和更高版本实现`Title`为悬停的工具提示，同时 Opera 3.0 和更高版本实现的属性`Title`属性为工具提示和 Opera 的工具栏区域中的标题.For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 and later and Netscape 6.0 and later implement the `Title` attribute as a hovering ToolTip, while Opera 3.0 and later implements the `Title` attribute as both a ToolTip and a caption in Opera's toolbar area. 并非所有客户端为其他的超链接属性显示工具提示。Not all clients display ToolTips for additional hyperlink attributes. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式设置属性`false`Web 窗体页中。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property to `false` in a Web Forms page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用作为其呈现站点地图数据源。The control uses a as a source for the site map data it renders. 如果未设置属性，控件使用由标识提供程序属性，它是默认值通常为站点配置层次结构中定义。If the property is not set, the control uses the provider identified by the property, which is the default defined for the site in the configuration hierarchy, typically the . 设置属性将指示控件呈现为提供程序定义的站点地图数据。Setting the property directs the control to render the site map data that the provider defines. 控件的工作方式直接与及其要显示站点映射信息的对象。The control works directly with a and its objects to display site map information. 其他控件，如和，需要提供的数据抽象类中，以显示相同的站点导航信息。Other controls, such as and , require a data abstraction, provided by the class, to display the same site navigation information. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，用于呈现替换文字，以让屏幕读取器跳过控件内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that is used to render alternate text for screen readers to skip the control's content.

value.span: 一个字符串， 控件使用不可见图像将其呈现为替换文字，作为对屏幕读取器的提示。

span.span: A string that the control renders as alternate text with an invisible image, as a hint to screen readers.

value.span: 默认值为“跳过导航链接”。

span.span: The default value is "Skip Navigation Links".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个属性，可设置为使网页更多或更少的屏幕阅读器的用户可访问。 is a property that you can set to make a Web page more or less accessible to users of screen readers. 包含在多个页，如显示站点地图数据的控件重复的内容的网站可以提供一种机制，允许用户的屏幕读取器，以便不读出跳过重复的内容。Web sites that contain content that repeats on multiple pages, such as controls that display site map data, can provide a mechanism that allows users of screen readers to skip the repeated content so that it is not read aloud. 控件提供屏幕读取器可以跳过整个控件的方法的属性。The control provides the property as a way for the entire control to be skipped by screen readers. 如果属性设置，则呈现不可见的图像的替换文字，向用户提供的选项以跳转到内容的末尾。If the property is set, an invisible image with alternate text is rendered, giving the user the option to jump to the end of the content. 屏幕读取器读取的替换文字，但映像不会干扰页的可视化流。Screen readers read the alternate text aloud but the image does not disturb the visual flow of the page. 默认情况下，这使得屏幕阅读器跳过该控件情况下，该属性设置为"跳过导航链接"。The property is set to "Skip Navigation Links" by default, which makes screen readers skip the control. 如果你想要禁用此行为，将属性设置为。If you want to disable this behavior, set the property to . 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
